# Tic-Tac-Toe UP!

Tic Tac Toe Up! is an online version of Tic Tac Toe in which there are no ties. Each player has only three markers (X's or O's) on the board at a time. When placing a fourth marker, the oldest one is removed. The game keeps going until someone winsâ€”no draws. The game is online and finds random opponents to play against for quick matches.
